attributes.action: Dog owners should have a licence to own and a licence to breed to help protect
attributes.additional_details: By implementing a licence it would give more power to the people who protect the welfare of the Dogs and ween out those who don't want a dog. I know the first steps would be hard to develop into society but in the future it could save the suffering of thousands of innocent dogs
attributes.background: There are thousands of dogs being abused everyday by people who do not know how to look after them or do not care. If someone reports I'll treatment of a dog the local charity's can't do anything if the dog is chipped and has food and water this is a system that doesn't work.
